fields.label: Email List
fields.description: Enter one email address per line for bulk verification. Leave empty if checking status of existing task.

fields.label: Task Name
fields.description: Name for this bulk verification task (only used when submitting new emails)

fields.label: Results Offset
fields.description: Starting position for paginated results when task is complete (default: 0)

fields.label: Results Limit
fields.description: Number of results to retrieve when task is complete (1-10000, default: 1000)

fields.label: Filter Results By Status
fields.description: Filter results by verification status when retrieving completed task results

fields.label: BounceBan API Key
fields.description: Select your connected BounceBan API key. You can find your API key at https://bounceban.com/app/api/settings
